name: Left of the Dot Media Inc.
tag_list: subdomain-leasing, domain-development, seo, internet-marketing, ecommerce, startup, domain-registrar
overview:
Left of the Dot changes the way domains are monetized. The company provides Domain Name portfolio holders with an alternative to domain parking for the very best names in their portfolio. This is done through a combination of website development and monetizing sub-domains (or â€œMarketing Namesâ€) off of the generic website. Examples of marketing names include: Tours.Oahu.com, Luxury.Villa.com, or California.Beef.com. Leasing sub-domains off a premium domain name will substantially increase the traffic, search engine value (SEO), and inherent value to the overall siteâ€”resulting in sustainable income for Left of the Dot’s clients.

Not only does the company focus on the client’s well-being, the results of Left of the Dotâ€™s many projects also benefit the end-consumer. The end-result of LOTD’s projects results in the development of online industry go-to destinations, an aggregation of quality content, and opportunities for SMEs to get online, get found and conduct business online.

Left of the Dot Media Inc. was established in 2010 and was awarded funding at T.R.A.F.F.I.C. Conference 2010, the largest conference in the industry.
